reviewText:
This is one of a set of similar DVDs from Soft Touch Video, and overall this one is OK but nothing outstanding. All the ladies on here are certainly nice looking and good models, and "Nude Hollywood Auditions" has ladies that I've seen on several DVDs on the DGD label.  From the dates on that company's DVDs it appears that at least this section of the DVD was probably filmed in the late 1990s.

Both "Nude Hollywood Auditions" (46 minutes) as well as the second section of this DVD, "Nude Slumber Party" (39 minutes), focus on slow-motion posing and stripping.  It's fairly entertaining, but to me it's slow enough that it gets rather lethargic after a while. About the first 10 minutes of "Nude Slumber Party" starts out with the 3 ladies sitting around chatting semi-nude as if really at a slumber party, and I wish the whole film had kept going that way rather than switching to slow-motion posing. The ladies on both segments do get completely nude, but the posing is not very explicit. Parts of these 2 segments have live sound, but most of the time there's a mostly innocuous music track going. The camerawork is decent, but none of this has a very sharp image despite being "digitally remastered." Picture quality is acceptable if you're not too picky, but if you're accustomed to seeing things in high definition this is going to look pretty fuzzy. The bonus segment on here is several minutes of trailers from other Soft Touch videos that appear to be similar to this.

In sum, this DVD is OK if you like slow-motion posing and stripping, and the fetching ladies are certainly the best aspect of this, but I can't recommend it highly because of the compromised picture quality.

the dialogue is about as contrived as a bad '70's porn flick, but that just make this all the more schmaltzy.

nice looking ladies; differing body styles; something for everyone.
